member.name: ASSOCDATA
member.summary: Used by to define the type of data that is to be returned.

member.name: ASSOCDATA.ASSOCDATA_MSIDESCRIPTOR
member.summary: The component descriptor to pass to the Windows Installer API.

member.name: ASSOCDATA.ASSOCDATA_NOACTIVATEHANDLER
member.summary: Attempts to activate a window are restricted. There is no data associated with this value.

member.name: ASSOCDATA.ASSOCDATA_EDITFLAGS
member.summary: Internet Explorer version 6 or later. Gets the data stored in the EditFlags value of a file association PROGID registry key. This value consists of one or more . Compare against those values to determine which attributes have been set.

member.name: ASSOCDATA.ASSOCDATA_VALUE
member.summary: Internet Explorer version 6 or later. Uses the pwszExtra parameter from the method as the value name.

summary.para: If this value is present, applications should check the Windows 2000 class store.
